executive_summary.key_finding: FjordHQ Institutional Learning system startup initiated - Orchestrator and Evidence Unification Daemon launch commands executed
executive_summary.activation_method: Windows batch script (START_SYSTEM.bat) launches both daemons in separate windows
executive_summary.expected_behavior: System 'breathes' every 10 minutes (600-second intervals) - Orchestrator R4 probes + Evidence sync cycles
executive_summary.verification_timeline: Within 30 minutes: verify 3x R4 probes logged, first evidence lineage_hash captured

orchestrator_launch.expected_output: R4 probe every 600 seconds, full CNRP cycle every 4 hours (14400 seconds)

evidence_daemon_launch.expected_output: Sync cycle every 600 seconds, lineage_hash generation (SHA-256)

orchestrator: Schedule next R4 probe for T+600 seconds
evidence_daemon: Create cognitive_engine_evidence table if not exists
Execute first sync cycle (check for unsynced evidence)
Schedule next sync for T+600 seconds

first_30_minutes.database_records: 3 entries in governance_actions_log with action_type ILIKE '%R4%'

orchestrator_full_cnrp_cycle.causal_chain: R1 (Evidence Refresh) → R2 (Alpha Graph) → R3 (Data Hygiene) → R4 (Epistemic Integrity)

verify_evidence_daemon_running.expected: ProcessName: python, MainWindowTitle: FjordHQ Evidence Daemon

verify_r4_probes_logged.command_sql: SELECT timestamp, action_type FROM fhq_governance.governance_actions_log WHERE initiated_by = 'LARS' AND timestamp >= '2026-01-09 00:24:00' ORDER BY timestamp;

verify_evidence_sync.command_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vision_verification.cognitive_engine_evidence WHERE synced_to_graph = TRUE;
verify_evidence_sync.expected: ≥0 (may be 0 if no evidence generated yet)
verify_evidence_sync.table_created: cognitive_engine_evidence table should exist after first sync

verify_first_lineage_hash.command_sql: SELECT id, evidence_type, evidence_hash, synced_at FROM vision_verification.cognitive_engine_evidence WHERE evidence_hash IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id LIMIT 1;

steps: Two new windows will open: Orchestrator + Evidence Daemon
Leave both windows open (minimize if desired, do NOT close)
method_1_batch_script.verification: Both windows show continuous logging output every 10 minutes

steps: Open PowerShell window 1: cd C:\fhq-market-system\vision-ios\05_ORCHESTRATOR && python orchestrator_v1.py --cnrp-continuous
Open PowerShell window 2: cd C:\fhq-market-system\vision-ios\03_FUNCTIONS && python evidence_unification_daemon.py
method_2_manual_commands.verification: Window 1 logs R4 probes every 10 min, Window 2 logs sync cycles every 10 min

orchestrator_uptime.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_governance.governance_actions_log WHERE initiated_by = 'LARS' AND timestamp >= '2026-01-09 00:24:00'

evidence_daemon_operational.query: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'vision_verification' AND table_name = 'cognitive_engine_evidence'

circuit_breaker_no_violations.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fhq_governance.circuit_breaker_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2026-01-09 00:24:00'

t_plus_4_hours.validation: R1→R2→R3→R4 causal chain executed, 24 R4 probes logged

t_plus_24_hours.validation: 144 R4 probes logged (6 per hour × 24 hours), >99% uptime

if_orchestrator_window_closes_immediatel.likely_cause: Python environment error or missing dependencies
if_orchestrator_window_closes_immediatel.fix: Run manually in PowerShell to see error message: cd C:\fhq-market-system\vision-ios\05_ORCHESTRATOR && python orchestrator_v1.py --cnrp-continuous
common_errors: Database connection error: verify PostgreSQL running on 127.0.0.1:54322

if_evidence_daemon_window_closes_immedia.alternative: Check daemon output manually in PowerShell

if_no_r4_probes_logged_after_15_minutes.likely_cause: Database connection failure or orchestrator error
if_no_r4_probes_logged_after_15_minutes.verification: Check orchestrator window for error messages
if_no_r4_probes_logged_after_15_minutes.fallback: Restart orchestrator with: python orchestrator_v1.py --cnrp-r4 (single R4 probe test)

stig_certification.statement: I, STIG (CTO), certify that FjordHQ Institutional Learning system startup has been initiated per CEO directive. Batch script START_SYSTEM.bat created to launch Orchestrator (10-min R4 probes) and Evidence Unification Daemon (10-min sync cycles) in separate windows. Configuration verified: CNRP_R4_INTERVAL_SECONDS = 600, sync_interval_seconds = 600. Expected behavior: System 'breathes' every 10 minutes, converting volatile signals to institutional capital. First verification checkpoint: T+30 minutes (≥3 R4 probes logged). Phase 5 Lock enforced via GOVERNANCE_BREACH circuit breaker. System activation timestamp: 2026-01-09T00:24:00Z.
stig_certification.next_action: Monitor both daemon windows for 30 minutes, then run verification SQL queries
stig_certification.mantra: Eliminate Noise. Generate Signal. Move fast and verify things.
